framesNormal.name: Heat Burst
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Burst
* Beats all Power Crush armor.
Power Crush

framesNormal.name: Ultimo Jaguar
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Smash
* Floor Break
* Shifts to JGR on block (without heat).
* Hold b to cancel shift, becomes +7 on block.
* Beats all Power Crush armor, hits OTG.

framesNormal.name: Anger Of The Beast (Rage Art)
framesNormal.notes:
* Armor all attacks and ignore throws.
* Beat all armor including Rage Art.
* Erases opponent's recoverable health on hit.
* Damage distribution are 10,3,25,10,7, only adds 2 damage on CH.

framesNormal.name: Palm Strike
framesNormal.notes:
* Jails
* Combo from 1st hit

framesNormal.name: Palm Strike Uppercut
framesNormal.notes:
* Forces standing on hit.
* The 3rd hit doesn't combo even 2nd on CH.
* Starter of 10 Strings, 3rd~5th hits are combo.

framesNormal.name: Palm Strike Uppercut > Suplex
framesNormal.notes: * Throw break 2.

framesNormal.name: Palm Strike Uppercut > V Driver
framesNormal.notes:
* Floor Break
* Crouch throw, cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Palm Strike > Head Jammer
framesNormal.notes: * Throw break 2.

framesNormal.name: Palm Strike > V Driver
framesNormal.notes:
* Floor Break
* Crouch throw, cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Right Jab > Uppercut
framesNormal.notes:
* Forces standing on hit.
* Combo from 1st hit.

framesNormal.name: Left Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Tracks left side but unsafe.

framesNormal.name: Right Kick
framesNormal.notes: * Knocks down on CH for dash OTG throw.

* Forces standing on hit.
* Shifts into backturn stance.

framesNormal.name: Head Spinner
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Combo from 1st hit.
* Hold back during 2nd hit to feint.

framesNormal.name: Brutal Sting
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Tornado
* Combo from 1st hit.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step
framesNormal.notes:
* Hold to continue spinning and power up strikes, but King doesn't change direction.
* King gets dizzy and falls after 6th spin.
Low crush 6~21 fs22~24
* Forces standing on hit.

framesNormal.name: Elbow Impact
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Engager

Balcony Break
* Heat Dash +5 on block, +18 on wall block.

* Combo from 1st hit.
* +16 on hit during heat or after heat.

* Floor Break
* Forces crouching on block and hit.
* Not combo even on CH, only combo from hitting behind.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Smash Combo
framesNormal.notes:
* Combo from 2nd to 3rd hit.
* 3rd hit is delayable and also combos.

framesNormal.name: Front Kick
framesNormal.notes: * Only forces standing on CH.

framesNormal.name: Front Kick > DDT
framesNormal.notes:
* Input during f+3 hit stun.
* Shifts to throw on front grounded hit.

framesNormal.name: Rolling Sobat
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
Homing
Low Crush

framesNormal.name: Body Check
framesNormal.notes: * Forces standing on hit.

framesNormal.name: Shoulder Tackle
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Engager

* Balcony Break
* Heat Dash +5 on block, +18 on wall block.

* +9 on hit during heat or after heat.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Sprint
framesNormal.notes:
* Cancel to r25 with b on frame 34~ at the earliest, able to block high.
* Gains armor during Heat.
* Partially uses remaining Heat time (same for uf+3+4 / db+1+2,3+4 / b+1+2 ).
* Forces standing on hit.

framesNormal.name: Elbow Sting
framesNormal.notes: * Combo from 1st hit if not fully delayed.
* Forces standing on hit.

framesNormal.name: Double Hook Disaster
framesNormal.notes:
* Combos on CH, otherwise opponent can duck.
* Delay hit confirmable.
* Special down state that allows low juggle.

* Forces standing on hit.
* Tracks left side. (one of the few for King)

framesNormal.name: Lasso Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Combos on CH, otherwise opponent can duck.
* Not available if df+3 whiffs.
* Recovers in FDFT.
* King's fastest low attack.
* Combos on CH even opponent is crouching.

framesNormal.name: Mincer
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* Wall combo tool.
* Combos on 2nd CH. Crumple on 3rd CH.
* Hold back to shift to backturn stance.
* Shift to backturn is 14F punishable.

framesNormal.name: Mincer Low
framesNormal.notes:
* Recovers in crouch on hit.
* Otherwise recovers in FDFT.
* Can also be done by db+1/FC.d+1/FC.db+1.

framesNormal.name: Jab > Uppercut
framesNormal.notes:
* Combos on CH.
* Forces standing on hit.
* Can also be done by FC.d+2/FC.db+2.

framesNormal.name: Stomp
framesNormal.notes: * Hits OTG.
* Fast low but very punishable.

framesNormal.name: Atlas Hammer
framesNormal.notes:
* Tornado
* Duck high and launch, very punishable.

framesNormal.name: Corporate Elbow
framesNormal.notes:
*
Floor Break
* Hits OTG.
* Forces Crouching on hit.
* CH enable 2 more Ali Kicks.
* Combo from 1st hit on CH.

framesNormal.name: Stagger Kicks
framesNormal.notes: * Combo from 2nd hit on CH.

framesNormal.name: Stagger Kick Spinning Uppercut
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Same property for d+3+4,2 / d+3+4,4,2
* Only combo if 2nd/previous kick on CH.

framesNormal.name: Stagger Kick Flurry
framesNormal.notes:
* Only available if 1st hit on CH.
* Last 3 kicks are combo.
* 5 kicks combo is impossible.

framesNormal.name: Brain Chop
framesNormal.notes: * Forces Crouching on block.

framesNormal.name: Crouching Low Kick
framesNormal.notes: * Tracks left side. (one of the few for King)

framesNormal.name: Low Drop Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Hits OTG.
* Recovers in crouch on hit.
* Otherwise recovers in FDFT.

framesNormal.name: Muscle Armor
framesNormal.notes:
* Able to tank 10 frame jab if King is -4 or less (1 frame earlier than other Power Crush)
* Armor duration is  24 frames if you let it end normally
* Armor move is cancelable into anything at frame 17
* Can be cancel into anything after chest out.
Power Crush

framesNormal.name: Muscle Armor > Emerald Elbow
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Engager

* Heat Dash +5 on block, +18 on wall block.

* Elbow has no armor, and input is delayable.
* Shifts to throw on front grounded hit.
* +8 on hit during heat or after heat.
* If attack absorbed,chip damage & -5 on block.
Power Crush

framesNormal.name: Muscle Armor > Jaguar Sprint
framesNormal.notes:
* Run immediately without pointing finger.
* Run much longer to action than regular run.
* Running has no armor if not during heat.
* Cancel window is smaller than Emerald Elbow.
Power Crush

framesNormal.name: Quick Hook
framesNormal.notes: Momentarily makes opponent airborne on CH, thus b+1,2 launches.

framesNormal.name: Quick Hook > Uppercut
framesNormal.notes:
* Tornado
* Launches opponent if b+1 on CH.

framesNormal.name: Quick Hook > Heel Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Combo from 1st hit on CH.
* Recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Arm Whip
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* Parry opponent's right punch.
* Side Switch. Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Chupacabra > Spinning Back Elbow
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Combo from 1st hit.

framesNormal.name: Chupacabra > Olympia Slam
framesNormal.notes: * Shifts to throw on front grounded hit.

framesNormal.name: Chupacabra > Head Butt
framesNormal.notes: * Forces crouching on block.

framesNormal.name: Spinning Heel Hold
framesNormal.notes:
* Parry opponent's left kick.
* Side Switch. Opponent recovers in FUFL.

framesNormal.name: Leg Screw > Figure Four Leg Lock
framesNormal.notes:
* Parry opponent's right kick.
* Just frame input right before camera returns to normal position to deal extra damage. 
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Toll Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Tornado
* Balcony Break
* Becomes -5 on block with chip damage if attack absorbed.
Power Crush

framesNormal.name: Guillotine Drop
framesNormal.notes:
* Shifts to throw on front grounded hit.
* Input 1+2 before b+3 hits.

framesNormal.name: Disgraceful Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Shifts into BT stance.

framesNormal.name: Backwards Jaguar Step
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot be held to continue spinning.
Low crush 6~21 fs22~24
* Jump straight up knee, very short range.

framesNormal.name: Capital Punishment
framesNormal.notes:
* Tap 1+2 otherwise it becomes u+1+2(hold).
* Forces Crouching on block.
* Can also be done by ub+1+2.

framesNormal.name: Burning Knuckle
framesNormal.notes:
* Unblockable mid.
* Auto switch side if fly over opponent.
* Can also be done by ub+1+2*.

framesNormal.name: Water Parting Chop
framesNormal.notes:
Homing
Balcony Break
* Can also be done by ub+1/u+1.

framesNormal.name: High Elbow Drop
framesNormal.notes:
* Hits OTG.
* u+2 to jump vertical, ub+2 to jump back.
* Force Crouching on block. (ub+2 also on hit)

framesNormal.name: Falling Heel Kick
framesNormal.notes: * Can also be done by ub+3/u+3.

framesNormal.name: Jumping Knee Lift
framesNormal.notes: * Can also be done by u+4.

framesNormal.name: Sole Crusher
framesNormal.notes:
* Tornado
* If absorbs attack, -7 on block & chip damage.
* Shifts to JGR on hit (Hold b to cancel shift).
Power Crush

framesNormal.name: Ki Charge
framesNormal.notes:
* Takes some time to charge and can cancel into anything.
* After charged next hit by either side becomes counter hit.

framesNormal.name: Low Parry
framesNormal.notes:
* Generic low parry.
* Tornado affect on success.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Hook
framesNormal.notes:
* Homing
* Balcony Break

framesNormal.name: Beast Elbow
framesNormal.notes:
* Forces crouching on block and hit.
* Allow crouching throw on hit.
* Chip damage on block.

framesNormal.name: Konvict Kick > DDT
framesNormal.notes:
* Tornado
* Balcony Break
* Shifts to throw on front grounded CH.

framesNormal.name: Diving Body Press
framesNormal.notes:
* Forces crouching on block and hit.
* Throw when hit standing in front close range.

framesNormal.name: Exploder
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* Chip damage on block. (extra near wall)
* Forces Crouching on block when near wall.
* Recovers FUFT on whiff.

framesNormal.name: Stomache Smash / Jaguar Hammer
framesNormal.notes:
* Shifts to throw on front grounded CH.
* Hits OTG.
high crush

framesNormal.name: Lay Off
framesNormal.notes:
* Forces Standing on hit.
* Allows follow up on CH.

framesNormal.name: Beast Step
framesNormal.notes:
* Duck high while moving forward.
* Input f,n,d,df,f+(button) for instant ws moves.
* 1st f cannot be held more than 10 frames.

framesNormal.name: Strong Knee
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* Chip damage on block.

framesNormal.name: Running Exploder
framesNormal.notes: Balcony Break

* Acts like 11 frame attack.
* Forces Standing on hit.

* Homing
* Forces Standing on hit.

framesNormal.name: Round Trip Chop
framesNormal.notes:
* Homing
* Balcony Break
* Combo from 1st hit.

framesNormal.name: Victory Palm
framesNormal.notes: Balcony Break

framesNormal.name: Reverse Special Stretch Bomb (Cancel)
framesNormal.notes:
* Side Step that ducks high and covers long distance quickly, recovers in crouch.
* Input by u/d,n,n+2+4,b/db.

framesNormal.name: Deadly Boomerang
framesNormal.notes:
* Deals a lot of chip damage on block.
* Tracks side steps.
* Side Step Left is 6 frames faster than SS Right.

framesNormal.name: Leg Breaker
framesNormal.notes:
* Can also be done by f,n,d,DF+1/CD.1.
* Tornado on grounded hit.
High Crush

framesNormal.name: Body Blow
framesNormal.notes: * Crumple on hit.

* Hits OTG.
* Can also be done by FC.db+3.
* Get extra range by FC.df+3/CD.3.

framesNormal.name: Blind Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Tornado
* Hits OTG. Forces standing on normal hit.
* Crumple on CH for full combo.

framesNormal.name: Blind Kick > Neck Breaker
framesNormal.notes:
* Floor Break
* Throw when hit standing in front close range.
* Just frame input.

framesNormal.name: Atomic Blaster
framesNormal.notes: * Unblockable high attack.

framesNormal.name: Moonsault Body Press
framesNormal.notes: * Unblockable mid attack.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step (BT)
framesNormal.notes:
* Jaguar Step away from the oppponent while keeping backturn stance on recovery.
* Can cancel into BT.1+2 / BT.1+4 unblockable.
* Can hold 3+4 to keep spinning.
* Cannot Reverse Jaguar Step in BT stance.

framesNormal.name: Low Drop Kick (BT)
framesNormal.notes:
* Recovers in FDFT on block and whiff.
* Also can be done in backturn crouching.
Low Crush

framesNormal.name: Whirling Spring Kick
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* Faster than normal spring kick and knocks down.

framesNormal.name: Running Elbow Smash
framesNormal.notes:
* In heat it becomes Tornado on grounded hit.
* Partially uses remaining Heat time.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Axe
framesNormal.notes:
* Chip damage on block.
* In heat it becomes +6 on block, and forces crouching +18 near wall.
* Partially uses remaining Heat time.

framesNormal.name: Sprint K.
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Homing
Low crush 11~30 fs31~33

framesNormal.name: Dashing Low Drop Kick
framesNormal.notes: Low crush 7~23 fs24~

framesNormal.name: Diving Body Press
framesNormal.notes:
* Throw when hit standing in front close range.
* King recovers off axis

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step > Hook
framesNormal.notes:
* Crumple on hit.
* On block / hit / startup increases up to 2nd spin.
* Damage increase up to 3rd spin.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step > Hammer
framesNormal.notes:
* Forces Crouching on hit.
* Forces Crouching on block from 3rd spin on.
* Damage increase up to 3rd spin.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step > Sobat
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* On block / hit increases up to 2nd spin.
* Damage increase up to 3rd spin.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step > Sobat & Press
framesNormal.notes:
* Throw when hit standing in front close range.
* Doesn't combo from JGS.3, but trades with 10 frame jab.
* Properties not changed with extra spins.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step > High Kick
framesNormal.notes:
* Balcony Break
* Guard Break
* Chip damage on block.
* On block / hit increases up to 2nd spin.
* Damage increase up to 3rd spin.

framesNormal.name: Jaguar Step > Mid Kick
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* On block increases up to 2nd spin.
* Damage increase up to 3rd spin.

framesNormal.name: Knee Lift
framesNormal.notes:
* Special down state that allows low juggle (on normal hit).
* Crumple on CH for full combo.

framesNormal.name: Black Bomb
framesNormal.notes:
Balcony Break
* Hits OTG.
* Bounce off ground on CH for full combo.

framesNormal.name: Half Boston Crab
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Any 1/1+2 break throw behind opponent's back, as well as RKO and chain throws.
* Side switch. Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Cobra Twist
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Any 2 break throw behind opponent's back except chain throws.
* Side switch? Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Argentina Backbreaker
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break.
* Any throw on standing opponent's left side.
* Side switch. Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Knee Crusher
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Any throw on standing opponent's right side.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Winding Nut
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break.
* Input f+1+3 to increase throw range, but its startup is 3 frames slower.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Suplex
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break.
* Input f+2+4 to increase throw range, but its startup is 3 frames slower.
* Side switch. Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Triple Arm Breaker (AB2a)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT. Max damage 50.

framesNormal.name: Chicken Wing Face Lock (AB2c)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFT.

framesNormal.name: Head Jammer (AB2b)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFL.

framesNormal.name: Struggle Combination (AB2b1)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR. Max Damage 60.

framesNormal.name: Rolling Death Cradle (AB3cb)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFL. Max damage 100.

framesNormal.name: Dragon Sleeper Finish (AB3ca)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA. Max damage 65.

framesNormal.name: Mid-Air Leg Cross Hold
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Input f+1+3 to increase throw range, but its startup is 3 frames slower.
* Opponent recovers in FDFT.

framesNormal.name: Spine Cracker
framesNormal.notes:
Tornado
* Cannot throw break.
* Input f+2+4 to increase throw range, but its startup is 3 frames slower.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Double Heel Hold (DHH)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Running Jaguar Bomb
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* Cannot throw break.
* Input quickly to "blue spark" (+5 damage).
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Aerial Jaguar Bomb
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* Cannot throw break.
* Also by JGR.1+3 against airborne opponent.
* Input quickly to "blue spark" (+5 damage).
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Stretch Buster
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Arm Breaker (AB1)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 Throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Standing Heel Hold (SHH1)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFR.

framesNormal.name: Giant Swing (From DHH)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Mash 1/2/3/4 to roll in midscreen to reduce damage, on wall splat damage is 32.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT if fails to roll.

framesNormal.name: Flapjack (From DHH)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFT.

framesNormal.name: Ultimate Tackle (UT)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break (except from behind).
* Catches standing and crouching opponent from all directions.

framesNormal.name: Clothesline Press (Rock Bottom)
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* 1+2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Wing Tearer
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Bow & Arrow Stretch Hold
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Camel Clutch
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Side Switch.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Half Boston Crab (OTG)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Side Switch.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Shoulder Cracker
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Turn Over
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL/FDFR.

framesNormal.name: Head Bomber
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* 1 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Figure Four Leg Lock (OTG)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Swing Away
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Mash 1/2/3/4 to roll in midscreen to reduce 10 damage, on wall splat damage is 35.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT if fails to roll.

framesNormal.name: Rapid King Onslaught
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Engager

* Cannot throw break. Cannot heat dash.
* Restores some Heat Gauge in Heat.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Cobra Clutch (MMD1)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFT.
* Becomes f,hcf+1 / 2+4 on air grab / wall splat.

framesNormal.name: Cobra Twist (MMD2)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFL.

framesNormal.name: Reverse DDT (MMD3)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Samurai Rock (MMD4a)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 Throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFR. Max Damage 69.

framesNormal.name: Reverse Special Stretch Bomb (MMD4)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Backdrop (MMD5)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Burning Hammer (MMD6)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Sol Naciente (MMD6a)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL. Max Damage 93.

framesNormal.name: Screwdriver (MMD7)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA. Max Damage 116.

framesNormal.name: Boston Crab (from PD)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break. (when legs lifted to the top)
* Could use ki charge button for 1+2 input.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Double Arm Face Buster (from PD)
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* 2 throw break. (when legs lifted to the top)
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Backdrop (RAS2)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Input with 2,1,1+2 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: German Suplex (RAS3)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Input with 3+4,1 or 3+4,2 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Power Bomb (RAS4)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Input with 1,2,3+4 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Giant Swing (RAS5a)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break. Side Switch.
* Input with 2,1,3,4 for more damage.
* On wall splat damage is 31.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT. Max damage 97.

framesNormal.name: Muscle Buster (RAS5b)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break. Side Switch.
* Input with 3,1,2,3+4,1+2 for more damage.
* King recovers in backturn stance.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA. Max damage 91.

framesNormal.name: Cannonball Buster (RSSB2)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break. 
* Input with 2,2,1+2 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Manhattan Drop (RSSB3)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 or 2 throw break, depending on King's input.
* Input with 3+4,1 or 3+4,2 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Victory Bomb (RSSB4)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Input with 1,2,3+4,1+2 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Giant Swing (RSSB5a)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break. Side Switch.
* Input with 2,1,3,4 for more damage.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT. Max damage 94.

framesNormal.name: Muscle Buster (RSSB5b)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Input with 3,1,2,3+4,1+2 for more damage.
* King recovers in backturn stance.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA. Max damage 88.

framesNormal.name: S.T.F. (SHH2a)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break. Side Switch.
* Opponent recovers in FDFR. Max damage 50.

framesNormal.name: Scorpion Death Lock (SHH2b)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFR. Max damage 55.

framesNormal.name: Indian Death Lock (SHH2c)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: King's Bridge (SHH3ca)
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFT. Max Damage 85.

framesNormal.name: Ultimate Punch
framesNormal.notes:
* Could be any 1/2 combination (e.g. 1,1,1,1 / 1,2,2,1)
* Throw break the 1st/4th hit by input the opposite to King's 1st/4th button.

framesNormal.name: Armbar
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Can also input at 3rd hit of Ultimate Punch.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Arm Twist
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Leg Cross Hold
framesNormal.notes:
* 3+4 throw break.
* Can also input at 3rd hit of Ultimate Punch.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Stretch Combo
framesNormal.notes:
* Just frame input.
* Cannot throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FDFL.

framesNormal.name: Shining Torpedo
framesNormal.notes:
* Cannot throw break. Also converts from RKO.
* Input quickly to "blue spark" (+5 damage).
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* Opponent recovers in FUFR.

framesNormal.name: Wall Jumping Attack
framesNormal.notes:
* Airborne from 5F, invincibility from 8 to 13F.
* Unbreakable throw near wall, becomes air attack if throw not connected.
* Side switch. Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Throw Away
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break. Side switch.
* Damage becomes 15 on wall splat.
* Shifts to JGR, input f,F / b,B to cancel shift.

framesNormal.name: Throw away > Back Swing
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Damage becomes 15 on wall splat.
* Shifts to JGR, input f,F / b,B to cancel shift.

framesNormal.name: Tombstone Pile Driver
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* 2 throw break. Can also be done by qcb,n,f+2+4 / b,db,d,n,f+2+4.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Figure Four Leg Lock
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Just frame input 3+4 when the last hit connects, reverse 26 damage back to King.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT / FDFT.

framesNormal.name: Reverse Arm Slam (RAS1)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break. Side Switch.
* Very slow crouch dash then grab.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Reverse Special Stretch Bomb (RSSB1)
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break. Side Switch.
* Very slow crouch dash then grab.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Knee Bash
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Frankensteiner
framesNormal.notes:
* Throw only when opponent standing close.
* Cannot throw break.
* Recovers in BT/FUFT on throw success/failed.
Low Crush

framesNormal.name: Iron Lariat
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* Crouch throw, cannot throw break.
* Can also be done by db+1+3 and in FC too.
* Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: V Driver
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* Crouch throw, cannot throw break.
* Can also be done by db+2+4 and in FC too.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Freedom Face Buster (Pedigree)
framesNormal.notes:
* Heat Engager

* Crouch throw, cannot throw break.
* Can also be done by db+1+4 and in FC too.
* Restores some Heat Gauge in Heat.
* Cannot heat dash.Opponent recovers in FDFA.

framesNormal.name: Tomahawk
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Input quickly to "blue spark" (+5 damage).
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* Opponent recovers in FUFL.

framesNormal.name: Giant Swing
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break. Side switch. 
* Input quickly to "blue spark" (+5 damage).
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* Mash 1/2/3/4 to roll in midscreen to reduce 20 damage, on wall splat damage is 70.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT if fails to roll.

framesNormal.name: Tijuana Twister
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break.
* Input quickly to "blue spark" (+5 damage).
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* f,b,d,f are required, so it can be done by f,b,db,d(,n),f+2. (same for Giant Swing)
* Opponent recovers in FUFL.

framesNormal.name: Muscle Buster
framesNormal.notes:
Floor Break
* 1+2 throw break. Side switch.
* King recovers in backturn stance.
* Partially restores remaining Heat time.
* Opponent recovers in FUFA.

framesNormal.name: Pile Driver (PD)
framesNormal.notes:
* 1 throw break.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.

framesNormal.name: Side Step to RSSB2 / RSSB1
framesNormal.notes:
* 2 throw break (except from behind).
* RSSB2 from side/behind, RSSB1 from front, doesn't change to left/right/behind throw.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.
* Throw can be canceled by input b/db.

framesNormal.name: Executioner Drop
framesNormal.notes:
* 1+2 throw break.
* Hold b to throw backwards.
* Damage becomes 15 on wall splat.
* Opponent recovers in FUFT.
